sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Visa ( V ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.6%.
Year to date, Visa registers a 1.9% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is 3M ( MMM ), trading down 1.1%.
3M is lower by about 0.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ), trading down 1.1%, and Verizon Communications ( VZ ), trading up 0.5% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
